greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A060736.
link: Boris Putievskiy, Transformations Integer Sequences And Pairing Functions, arXiv:1212.2732 [math.CO], 2012.
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n) = (i+j-1)*(i+j-2)/2+j, where i=min(t; t^2-n+1), j=min(t; n-(t-1)^2), t=floor(sqrt(n-1))+1. - _Boris Putievskiy_, Dec 24 2012
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 20 2001
